content: I have an Android Tab A and it kept freezing at one point over and over. I'd like a refund for both downloads or fix the damn game or both!
Everything is cool until i cant pass and got stuck on the cable car. What to do ..... ðŸ˜­
Game kept freezing up! And wouldn't load up! Very, frustrating! Hope to switch to another game! I`m on an android Galaxy Tab A!
Good game, the graphics are a bit dark, probably intentionally due to the story, but it makes it difficult for older people. Otherwise the game has it all. Great fun.
It is good but I like the old original ones better
Pakyu Mateo

It's so apparent how much work and thought went into this. The game is just filled with little graphic details and storyline touches that are so clever. I totally dig almost the entire Ravenhearst series.
It was good needs to be longer i finished in 3 days

Love the game Ravenhearst series. They have an entertainment factor as well the searches; which are challenging but not stupid-they don't hide all but a corner of the object liKe some other games. I love the mini-games, also a challenge to figure out. So I am not a Mensa I do have some intelligence. This series is entertaining and challenging. Slightly gruesome side for the weak stomach. The first Ravenhearst is not available for my Samsung tablet. Don't try on a cell phone. Way too tiny.
I've loved it BUT I was going through my apps permissions, and this app had access to my phone, contacts, allowed to modify system settings, and more! Why on earth does it need access to those???
every time i open this game i get ads! even though i paid for full a year ago. also many games i paid for are no longer aviable! i will not ever be a returning custermer!
Great game

Fun game ,as usual irritations from constant requests to rate or to buy some un related other game, just because we buy from you does not give you the right to abuse a customers goodwill , it ruins your loyalty

Tried playing this on my fire 10 and Galaxy 10. Both times after going to the mansion on the trolley it won't work anymore. Won't let me take the trolley again. Needs to be fixed or stop offering this game.
Stuck in the cave. Can't get the green jewel
Nice game and i love it
Good game
Great game, with complex puzzles.
cool game
keeps freezing
Game crashed
Great storyline, the games are very good as are tge graphics and i love this series!
I downloaded this but it gets to the end of installation and says can't download try again. twice. Regretting paying for this

Don't waste your money,game freezes half way through and won't open.Shame on big fish for ripping people off.I used to love big fish games now it seems most of their games have glitches.I won't be playing anymore of their games.
I paid full price for the game but still have to endure all the ads.
Purchased this game and never got to play it because it would never load. I uninstalled and reinstalled several times to no avail...very disappointed!
love it
Total waste of time game locks up half way through.
Keeps freezing have to restart it all the time very annoying and disappointing as I loved the first game
Mcf rocks.. So far so good
Great graphics, fun storyline, tough puzzles

This is an excellent game, they were very creative with the atmosphere and the variety of puzzles. I also like that it had a fast hint, although it wasn't needed all that much if you took your time. My one massive complaint is who thought it was a good idea to unzoom every time you found something in a hidden object scene? These are the times that I wonder if the developers actually play the game because that is super annoying. So it's find an item, then you have to re-zoom and find your place again. Did I mention how super annoying that is? Two full Stars deducted for that blunder alone. But don't let it stop you from playing this game, it's very good. Just please, never ever do that again with the zooming.

Unfortunately would not load properly. Its an expensive game if you get half way through and then can't complete. The first game that I have had this problem with and will be complaining to google play.

I was really looking forward to playing this but during the start of the game it appeared to glitch and I couldn't make any progress within one of the puzzles. When I pressed 'hint' it would tell me to leave but always returned me to the same place when I wanted to make progress within the game. Without having any option to continue the game I ended up having to unistall it. Its such a shame really, the part that I was able to play was really good.
Brilliant game and already into it, can't put it down.

The game keeps crashing all the time and I can't play it I've asked for a 
refund but it's sent me to some thing that won't let me get a refund I'm 
not happy would not recommended this game

It will only go on internal memory. And it takes a lot of space. You can 
not zoom in. This makes it hard to read on the phone. I wasted my money.
Awesome game

This game is great even its too easy and shorts. The scene is blurry with low resolution, with that price i hope i got the better resolution for my high end phone. I have samsung galaxy s8 with big memory so i installed 50+ high space consuming games (+- 2gb pergames) but they make it compatible with external storage / sd card. This game is space consuming with internal storage only, make it move to external storage and i will give 5 star.
Love eipix games. More please.  Elephant's ones r not challenging at all.
Want a refund won't download at all
Good game but can't finish.  Stuck on the cable car.
Cant get past cottage
Love the Ravenhearst series. This one has the best controls so far.

Yes i am one of many that have also now come across the glitch in chapter 4 which doesn't allow you to go any further (between the cable car, beach and room). I have sent an email to the developers, and now we wait.....
Glitchy issues go unfixed. I am also stuck in the cable car. Uninstalled reinstalled. Restarted. No change. First reported this issue in 2015. Fixed? Nah. Don't waste your time. Or your money.
Stuck in the cable car cannot get back to the beach, replayed this game 5 times now and gets stuck at the cable car and cave wish I hadn't wasted my money

I normally enjoy all the ravenhurst stories, but i'm stuck after getting the pod and getting back tot the ship wreck. There is no way to get the cable car to go back.  Also freezes on loading. Have to try a few times.  Any help or fix is greatly appreciated.
Wish I could  play, I have a new Samsung tab.
Good game,  but puzzles seem hard for me.  The characters  R a little creepy, but its fun to play!
Rock star keep making these!
I could not finish playing game

Good graphics but I don't like going back and forth in mainly one small area... house, etc. I like roaming around and some back and forth in a large area with many levels and places to discover and go. This made me feel trapped. I lovw a lot of strangely beautiful and creepy outside places too. This did not hold my interest at all. I preferred Madam Fate's Carnival over this by far.
I can't open the game..!!!stuck up!!! I payed already!!! Pls open it!!!!
Key to Ravenhearst
Gutted
Very good so far
Game was going great until I got stuck between the cable car and the shipwreck. Can't move anywhere. Would like to be able to finish the game or a refund!
It has all the bells and whistles. I recommend it and give it an 8. Drawback everything you complete something the typewriter hint button clicks many keys and the sound is annoying.
Excellent as was Unlocked.  Bring more like these two. Would give it more if I could.

Love the game except it freezes, then very slowly loads the scene. Then when the screen is touched, it freezes briefly, then kicks you out completely. UPDATE: apparently after one complains about freezing, and perhaps sending an email to the developer (found in 'Read more about game description', the glitches disappear. Is this planned? Which is why I give a 4 instead of 5 star. But to developers: thanks for fixing my game so I can play it now (a real, not sarcastic, thanks). BTW, What was the name of the first Ravenhearst? I'd like to play the whole series, starting with the first?
Best Ravenhearst yet! Puzzles within puzzles and hidden objects within hidden objects.
Awesome game. Challenging. But I got stuck between the control tower/room and cart. I can't seem to go back down to the beach and it won't allow me to restart. I really wanted to finish the game:(
Key to raven Hearst freezing between floors I hit hint it says to go down but it won't go down

I paid for this game...it freezes...won't open and won't respond when it finally does open. I would really like a refund...I buy almost all your games but this one has been super disappointing... I would still buy your games if you make this right
Great game. Keep on going!!!
I paid for the game and I cant see any of the instrustions or the hint buton all  I see is computer writing can you fix it if not can I get a refund please
This is a very good game
I thought the Raven Hearst series was over and then you revive it with this gem. I love this series. Hope you put out another one.
This was fun until it started freezing up at the loading screen. fix it.
Keeps freezing . Please fix .
Was gud
5 stars! I am still playing. It's a long game!

Genius rendition of a great series' sequel. A bit glitchy, alas, but you get there. Map, morphs, teleporter, collectible harbingers, challenging puzzles and a fast hint - you need it! And a guide. But the characters, the music, the suspense - terrific. Thanks again, Eipix, easily the best current game producers. However, after completing, I have had to reduce to 4 stars. It is just too hard to do the composite puzzles. I love these, but you cannot expand them, so they are too small to manipulate. Many of the tokens and functions wouldn't work on my tablet. ðŸ˜¦ I f you can make these puzzles expandable, Eipix, I will be very happy.
Stuck in the cable car. Can't go back to the shipwreck to continue. Would rate higher if I wasn't stuck.
Great game
The controls were a little sticky, particularly when doing the souvenirs, but otherwise it was a great game. I love the Ravenhearst series of MCF and I can't wait for the next one!
Too confusing. Too many mini puzzles.

This game ups the wow factor of HOG  in general,  and MCF specifically. If you've enjoyed these types of games before you will love this one. If you've never played one then this is a fantastic one to start with. I gave it a 4 only because there are 3 specific puzzles that offer zero clues for how to solve.  They involve placing images in a special order. You basically just move things around in a random order until something clicks. Lots of great extras for a 2nd playthrough.

I have for many years been a Big Fish customer. I have bought many games online for my PC as well as on my tablet and on my phone. This game is beautiful and wonderful however now it can not be played. I paid for the full version and now when i go to load it the game gets to 100% and wont do anything except get a dark screen. Im so so angry to actually spend money and get a unplayable game. I will update this info if the game or anything changes until then i ask others to beware of the game being unplayable

I LOVE this game, but I am almost to the end and it glitches and will not open.  It freezes after loading to 100%.  Please fix, I love the Ravenhearst series!        Update-it just now let me finish, and I played the bonus game too, well worth the price!  A lot of thought went into this game, thanks for making it!  Please continue the series :)
During the last chapter, the game begins to run so slow it is impossible to play. Can't finish the last few minutes of the game due to a glitch. Not replayable

It's got all the things we love in an HOA game. The artwork is nifty (ya gotta love the snails), the story appropriately absurd. What I especially appreciate is that the screen tells you when there's a morph or collectible and the intricate puzzles (super puzzles) are a delight! This is nothing but Eipix fun at it's best. Enjoy, and thanks, Eipix.  Koki,  you're welcome! Glad I could help. 6/15/2016.
Only like the mystery case files series and this was well worth the wait.
Love all the details,  very well made  , but... the volume control on your end dose not go loud enough,  everything else  is wonderful!  Keep up the hard work ...
Easily the best game I've played

I can't believe how good and how long this game was. Graphics were amazing, storyline was nice and haunting. It was honestly a fantastic game. This is the first I have played in this series and now all I can think of is finding the previous ones and playing them.
This story goes on and on. Good graphics and puzzles.  I can almost do this one.  When will it end?
Best of the series  wish the inmates were in the main game and not just the bonus  one
Really good game - my only issue,  it lags going from scene to scene.

But... controls got more sluggish and lost sensitivity as the game went on. So much so that I couldn't play several puzzles (my favorite parts). Very long wait between scenes. Up to 1-2 min. At the end it barely deserved 4 stars. Too bad because everything else about this game was terrific. Plenty of memory on board by the way. Using Samsung galaxy tab A with 5.0.2 lollipop.
Buggy, freezing in the final chapter, can't finish the game. Uninstalled, reinstalled, followed all the other suggestions and it won't let me move forward.  Will rate it higher if they fix it.
Great game but personally i liked the other Ravenhearst games better
Good story and graphics. Would have given it 5 stars if it didn't lag as much.

I've been following this series since the original game, when it was 80% HOG and jigsaw puzzle... as of this game, I'd say it's more 80% minigame puzzles, and they were top notch this game! Has been an interesting evolution. Story-wise, unsure about series continuity but flows well and has great twists! This family, whoa! Rated 4 for some lag during cutscenes and switching locations, as well as one hugely annoying puzzle where an object was placed where i access my phone's menu bar.

I can't say enough about Key to Ravenhurst. The story, graphics and gameplay are all top notch. No glitches or wonky bits. Parts of the story hearken back to other MCF titles for a nice bit of continuity. If you like games like this, then don't miss out on this one!
Good. Lots of collectibles, bonus game and extras.
It seemed a little laggy.  It took a long time to load the game.   Otherwise, I Very much enjoyed the game
Good game good map. Worth $2.99

GLITCHES GALORE.... SCREENS GO BLACK ON START UP AND ON SWITCH/CUTSCENE...etc... FREEZES UP ON STARTUP SOMETIMES AFTER IT REACHES 100%...    I just wanted to thank Melissa Gury AGAIN for me seeing there's a new game released.  I watch Big Fish and Google Playstore but still no sign of new game BUT I can check out Melissa's page and know that she's got it and all I've gotta do is click download...  Thanks darlin...I'm ALWAYS on pins and needles each week waiting for new game and praying there's 2 !!!! ;)
Didnt bloody respond at the very end ðŸ˜
I paid for game and it would not down load. So I didnt get to play it. Can I get my money back?
The story made no sense at all. It took ages to open and the puzzles were too complicated and very unresponsive when tapping. Don't think I will bother playing this one again.
Puzzle games within good story line. Just a few bugs when it crashes out but restarts without loss of progress
Another great MCF chapter. No issues, except that sometimes having to multiple tap an item to get it to accept. Look forward to the next.
Keeps kicking me out of the game every 5 mins or so. Cannot complete a mini game as it is not allowing me to finish. Please fix or refund....!
Game keeps freezing & very glitchy . Wouldn't allow me to type in profile name. Stuck between cave room and cable car. Lost all progress because I had to reinstall.
Addictive.
I was really enjoying this, paid for full version, then it won't load. Very disappointed.  Would like a refund please.

I love that they brought  this one back my only problem  with the game is when you go on the guide it shows collection items but doesn't list morphing items instead it list items that are not in the game. But as for the game itself  it wonderful
Tiny writing on a mobile. No facility to zoom writing is annoying!
Great mistery and good story line
Had to restart game because of glitch seems like the are quite a few I expect better from eipex as they are the best developer of these games just slow down and make sure they work
Kept freezin ever couple of mins really bad
Great game if you like challenging puzzles,  the super puzzles are wonderfully done and so much fun to solve.
Worth waiting for definitely purchase this want more of these games more more more please

Question: Has EIPIX always authored the MF games. I've played them for years & don't remember if they wrote the early ones. Will edit this later

I get around 10mins play then it hangs my tablet forcing me to hard reboot. Requesting a refund as its unplayable

Great game
Loving this game. Great work can't wait to see what's next!
I can find the ravens in each scene but the souvenirs are unable to be found. Can you please fix this immediately so that I can get the most out of the game? Thank you!
Another MCF game!

All I can say to describe this game is, WOW!  Eipex really got this right and more!  It's creepy, haunting and scary!  It's Ravenhearst, the next generation!  Everything was perfect to even the " making of " explaining how everything was put together. I would totally recommend this game. Make sure you start with nerves of steel!  Excellent Eipix!
Love it!
